H0.text: Which author died in a car crash in 1960, three years after receiving the Nobel Prize for Literature. Albert Camus

H1.text: Which author died in a car crash in 1960, three years after receiving the Nobel Prize for Literature. Ernest Hemingway

H2.text: Which author died in a car crash in 1960, three years after receiving the Nobel Prize for Literature. Boris Pasternak

H3.text: Which author died in a car crash in 1960, three years after receiving the Nobel Prize for Literature. Camusian

A4.text: Camus died on 4 January 1960 at the age of 46, in a car accident near Sens, in Le Grand Fossard in the small town of Villeblevin.
